summary: Background compilation, completion, bib serch, toc and other nice features.
name: AutomaticTexPlugin
description:
This is a BIG plugin with lots of tools to make editing of TeX/LaTeX file easier. It's main features include: background compilation, extended completion, AMSRef equry for bibliography references, font preview, support for projects with multiple tex files, and much more. For a detailed list of features see: 
https://sourceforge.net/apps/mediawiki/atp-vim/index.php?title=Main_Page 
After looking there you can read the complete documentation in vim (:help automatic-tex-plugin.txt) 

You can DONATE for this project  (on the project web page: http://sourceforge.net/projects/atp-vim/) 
(see :h atp-donate). 

The project is developed under GPL v3 or higher. 

You can subscribe to the mailing list: 
https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/atp-vim-list 
Its for all kind of purposes: help, bug reports, feature request, comments but also for ANNOUCES (of new releases!) so you can stay up to date. 

Project News: https://sourceforge.net/news/?group_id=513143

This plugin includes: vimscript#3109  (LatexBox by David Munger). 

BUG tracker: send a mail to the mailing list: https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/atp-vim-list 
PROJECT site: http://sourceforge.net/projects/atp-vim/
install_details: To install open the vimball file and source it ':so %' or ':source %'. You can use $HOME/.atp.vim configuration file to set the atp variables, which is handy for local-buffer settings.

versions.release_notes: See ver 9.1 (important fix in doc file, thanks to I.Lopez)
See :h atp-news for changes [ there are some NEW features :), and many fixes! ]
* for the changes see :h atp-news. Probably the most important is that completion supports beamer commands and environments.
See the help file for changes.

* AMSRef : bang has opposite meaning now.
* Many small fixes.
* Abbreviations (see :h atp-news) and fixes of vip.
* Some fixes. As usual, check :h atp-news
Some fixes in the new command AMSRef, completion for :GotoFile, :EditIntpuFile commands.

Filetype plugin for bib files added.
Command to obtain bib data from amsref web page interface (for both bib files and bibliography environments)
For lots of other new stuff read :h atp-news
